CustomField.description: Track what marketing services want the topic of the inbound creative content record to do or change.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Goals section of the notes is where we want to notate what we want this topic to do or change. What is this topic doing to drive more leads? Provide an entree point for new users? Increase the ranking/Visibility for a specific term? Influence buyers' decisions to prime readers for conversion? Act as a final sales point to increase leads/Conversion?
CustomField.label: Goal
